Package edu.ntnu.Backend.service

Class AssignmentUserService

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.Backend.service.AssignmentUserService
@Service public class AssignmentUserService extends Object
A class meant to use the access-point made to the assignmentUser table in the database. This class uses the methods from the AssignmentUserRepository

    • findBySubjectCodeAndYearAndUserID

      public List<AssignmentUserDAO> findBySubjectCodeAndYearAndUserID(String subjectCode, int schoolYear, int userID)
      A method to find all assignments for a user given a user id, subject code and school year.
      Parameters:
      subjectCode - The subject code to check for assignments in.
      schoolYear - The school year to check for assignments in.
      userID - The user you want the assignments for.
      Returns:
      Returns the list of assignments for this user in this subject.

    • findAllSubjectsByUserID

      public List<AssignmentUserDAO> findAllSubjectsByUserID(int userID)
      A method to find all subjects for a user.
      Parameters:
      userID - the given user you want to search for.
      Returns:
      returns all the subjects for this user.

    • changeStatusOfAssignment

      public void changeStatusOfAssignment(int assignmentUserId)
      A method to change the status of an assignment.
      Parameters:
      assignmentUserId - the unique id for the specific assignment you want to change the status of.

    • findAssignmentUserById

      public AssignmentUserDAO findAssignmentUserById(int assignmentUserId)
      A method to find a specific assignment.
      Parameters:
      assignmentUserId - the unique id for the specific assignment you want.
      Returns:
      Returns the specific assignment.
